title: LeBron James, Aaron Rodgers, Warriors, and the Steelers
itunes:title: LeBron James, Aaron Rodgers, Warriors, and the Steelers
description:
Colin discusses Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James' latest milestone, why Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers will never be the greatest, more on the Golden State Warriors drama, and the end of the Le'Veon Bell-Steelers contract dispute. Guests include Chris Broussard, Greg Cosell, Greg Jennings, and Matt Barnes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
